exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros bs H. induction H. - intros us H1 H2. destruct us. + simpl in H1, H2. injection H1 as Hb. subst. apply nilGRBar. + inversion H2. - intros us H1 H2. destruct us. + inversion H2. + injection H1 as Hb Hr. subst. apply lem1aux with (l:=bs). * apply H. * reflexivity. * apply H0.
